document.full_text: basketball fans utilize the triumphs of any player as a mechanism to spark irrelevant debate, but doing so needlessly disregards the on-court brilliance of all players involved.
document.title: appreciation trumps comparisons between stars
lines_and_colors: basketball fans utilize the triumphs of any player as a mechanism to spark irrelevant debate, but doing so needlessly disregards the on-court brilliance of all players involved.
